Package acctMgr.model

Class Agent

  • java.lang.Object
    • acctMgr.model.AbstractModel
      • acctMgr.model.Agent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Model, ModelListener, java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AgentDeposit, AgentDepositTestClass, AgentWithdraw, AgentWithdrawTestClass
    public abstract class Agent
extends AbstractModel
implements ModelListener, java.lang.Runnable
    abstract agent for conducting operations on Account. The Agent is a ModelListener for the Account in which it conducts operations.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jon Pierre

      • killThread

        public void killThread()
        Kills current Agent thread. If its paused, thread is resumed and previous transfer operation will be attempted before thread is killed.
